data.name: _adsFinishSetupAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable the "Lets finish setting up your device" and other advertising.

data.name: _adsLockScreenAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable tips and ads on the lock screen.

data.name: _adsPersonalizedAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable personalized ads.

data.name: _adsSettingAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable ads in settings.

data.name: _adsStartmenuAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable ads in the start menu.

data.name: _adsTailoredExperiences_desc
data.value: Tailored Experiences allows Microsoft to get information from you to deliver personalized tips, ads, and recommendations. Many people would call this telemetry, or even spying.

data.name: _adsFileExplorerAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable ads in File Explorer.

data.name: _adsTipsAndSuggestions_desc
data.value: This feature will disable general tips and ads.

data.name: _adsWelcomeExperienceAds_desc
data.value: This feature will disable ads in the welcome experience.

data.name: _aiRecallCurrentUser_desc
data.value: This feature will disable Recall from saving snapshots of your screen.

data.name: _edgeBrowserSignin_desc
data.value: This setting controls whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with an account to use services such as sync and single sign on

data.name: _edgeDefaultTopSites_desc
data.value: Hide default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge

data.name: _edgeDefautBrowserSetting_desc
data.value: Force Edge to stop asking to change default browser.

data.name: _edgeEdgeCollections_desc
data.value: Enables users to access the Collections feature, allowing them to gather, organize, share, and export content more efficiently with Office integration.

data.name: _edgeEdgeShoppingAssistant_desc
data.value: Shopping in Microsoft Edge feature will automatically find you the best prices and coupons from across the web as you shop.

data.name: _edgeFirstRunExperience_desc
data.value: Hide home screen and 'Getting Started' on initial launch (from version 80 onwards).

data.name: _edgeGamerMode_desc
data.value: Microsoft Edge Gamer Mode allows gamers to personalize their browser with gaming themes and gives them the option of enabling Efficiency Mode for PC gaming, the Gaming feed on new tabs, sidebar apps for gamers, and more.

data.name: _edgeHubsSidebar_desc
data.value: This feature will disable Copilot in Microsoft Edge.

data.name: _edgeImportOnEachLaunch_desc
data.value: Allow import of data from other browsers on each Microsoft Edge launch.

data.name: _edgeStartupBoost_desc
data.value: Enables Microsoft Edge processes to initialize at operating system startup and restart in the background after the last browser window has been closed.

data.name: _edgeTabPageQuickLinks_desc
data.value: By default, when you open a new tab, you see a Bing search bar, Bing image of the day set as the page background. For supported websites, Quick Links on the New Tab page can display recent updates right in the tile.

data.name: _edgeUserFeedback_desc
data.value: Allow the submission of feedback, suggestions, or customer surveys, as well as reporting issues with the browser.

data.name: _adsLockScreenAds
data.value: Disable Lock Screen Tips and Ads

data.name: _aiRecallCurrentUser
data.value: Dont' Allow Windows to save snapshots of your screen

data.name: _edgeBrowserSignin
data.value: Disable Browser sign in and sync services

data.name: _edgeDefaultTopSites
data.value: Don't Show Sponsored links in new tab page

data.name: _edgeDefautBrowserSetting
data.value: Disable Microsoft Edge as default browser

data.name: _edgeEdgeShoppingAssistant
data.value: Disable Shopping assistant in Microsoft Edge

data.name: _edgeImportOnEachLaunch
data.value: Don't Allow to Import of data from other browsers on each launch

data.name: _edgeTabPageQuickLinks
data.value: Don't Show Quick links in new tab page

data.name: _aiCopilotTaskbar_desc
data.value: This feature will disable Copilot in Taskbar.

data.name: _privacyBackgroundApps_desc
data.value: This feature will disable running apps in background.

data.name: _privacyPrivacyExperience_desc
data.value: This feature will disable Privacy Settings Experience at sign-in.

data.name: _privacyFindMyDevice_desc
data.value: This feature will disable find my device.

data.name: _privacyPrivacyExperience
data.value: Disable Privacy Settings Experience at sign-in

data.name: _privacyTelemetry_desc
data.value: Unfortunately, Microsoft does not allow Windows 11 or Windows 10 Home edition users to completely turn off the collection of telemetry data. However, those users can still limit some optional data collection through System settings.

data.name: _systemFullContextMenus
data.value: Show Full context menus in Windows 11

data.name: _systemFullContextMenus_desc
data.value: This feature will enable full context menus in Windows 11.

data.name: _systemLockScreen_desc
data.value: This feature will disable the personalized lock screen.

data.name: _systemVerboseMessages_desc
data.value: This feature will display highly detailed status messages.

data.name: _systemXPSWriter_desc
data.value: This feature will uninstall the XPS Documents Writer.

data.name: _taskbarBingSearch_desc
data.value: This feature will disable Bing Cloud content search.

data.name: _taskbarMostUsedApps
data.value: Hide Most used apps in start menu

data.name: _taskbarMostUsedApps_desc
data.value: This feature will hide the most used apps in start menu.

data.name: _taskbarSearchbox_desc
data.value: You can choose whether the search box shows on your taskbar. If you don't want to see a search box on your taskbar, you can hide it here.

data.name: _taskbarStartButtonAlignment_desc
data.value: This feature will align the Start button to the left.

data.name: _taskbarStartmenuLayout
data.value: Pin more Apps on start menu

data.name: _taskbarStartmenuLayout_desc
data.value: This feature will change the start layout to show more pins (and hide recommendations) in the Start menu. If disabled, more recommendations will be shown instead of pins.

data.name: _taskbarTaskbarChat_desc
data.value: By default, the chat feature allows you to access Microsoft Teams easily. But, if you don’t use Teams or just don’t want the icon on your taskbar, you can hide it.

data.name: _taskbarTaskView
data.value: Hide Task view button on taskbar

data.name: _taskbarTaskView_desc
data.value: This feature will disable the task view button on the taskbar.

data.name: _taskbarWidgets_desc
data.value: This feature will remove Widgets from the Taskbar.

data.name: _systemFaxPrinter_desc
data.value: This feature will uninstall the Fax Printer.

data.name: _aiRecallLocalMachine_desc
data.value: This feature will disable system-wide snapshots.

data.name: _logFinalCheckMessage
data.value: Thank you for using xd-AntiSpy! If you find this tool useful, consider donating to support its development: https://paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=MY7HX4QLYR4KG

data.name: _logFinalCheckMessage2
data.value: Follow and contribute to the project on GitHub: https://github.com/builtbybel/xd-AntiSpy

data.name: formAbout_lblAbout
data.value:
(c)2024 A Belim app creation While there's no guarantee xD-Antispy will work perfectly on your system, I've tested it extensively. Remember, it's a one-person project and I'm just human.
This tool is open source and will always be free. I'm committed to keeping it updated and improving.
xD-Antispy is a modern fork of the classic XP-Antispy for Windows 11, evolving to meet today's privacy challenges.
xD-Antispy – because privacy settings should make you smile!
-Belim-

data.name: formAbout_linkDonation
data.value: Your support helps keep this app running and growing—thank you! — Belim

data.name: formToolDebloater_errorNoAppsCount
data.value: Please select at least one app to remove.

data.name: formSymbolRef_checkInfoPlugins
data.value: Furthermore, AI-generated and verified plugins have been automatically loaded into the app's plugins folder. These plugins can be seamlessly integrated into the list view or accessed through the tools menu. Explore these enhancements to tailor your experience and optimize functionality effortlessly.

data.name: formSymbolRef_lblActive
data.value: Active: When an option is checked and grayed out, it means the setting is active.

data.name: formSymbolRef_lblGreen
data.value: Remember, keeping certain settings active can enhance your system's privacy and performance. Adjust these options according to your needs, and enjoy a more secure computing experience!

data.name: formSymbolRef_lblInactive
data.value: Inactive: If an option is unchecked and the text is in a normal color, the setting is inactive. You can enable it by simply checking the box and pressing the apply button.

data.name: formSymbolRef_lblRed
data.value: Additionally, for this app, there are cool and recommended profiles available on various online communities like Reddit and Deskmodder. As the app is new and growing, if you're unsure about which settings to configure, checking out these profiles can provide valuable insights. Explore and discover optimal configurations that suit your preferences, ensuring a personalized and enhanced user experience!

data.name: menu_profilesToolStripMenuItem
data.comment: プロファイルメニュー
